text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi PM @narendramodi weather student, Business men,common people, official,private sector businesses, everyone is suffering inJ&K a lot from Aug.19. Now plz restore 4G internet it's need of the hour. Especially for online classes students r suffering 4rm both sides COVID19 & net ban.
